idea:
At SourceCode Labs, we develop products to build the relationship between the business and customers. Our core competencies relate to data driven strategies, information, and interaction design, as well as real-time data visualisation.
We explore new relationships between humans and data. This leads us to test new ideas, formats and technologies. Our advanced dashboards and multi-point communication methods gives the users visual access to data.
Our team is diverse with right number of members to optimally work on the products we design and develop. The balance of skills, views and experience helps us to build advanced interactive products.
name: SOURCECODE LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Healthnovo is a hybrid healthcare  startup which primarily aims at helping 
you prioritize your health needs with the help of affordable, easily 
accessible and extremely agile health  care solutions. The test results are 
stored digitally and a high level of  privacy is maintained.
The different services offered by Healthnovo are as follows :
1. Digital Mapping of Healthcare consumers
2. Doctor Consultation
3. Conducting Diagnostic Screening test.
4. Generic Pharmacy.
5. Health Wallet Data Storage, Alerts and follow up
6. Blood Bank / Ambulance services.

Our star product is Healthnovo ATM - It is a compact device designed to perform instant diagnostic screening tests related to cardiology, neurology, pulmonary testing and gynecology.

We are happy to tap the special purpose health care needs  of entities Ike corporates, schools, business houses etc.
name: HEALTHNOVO DIGILIFE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We work liaison in for your dream project. We have an Expertise of more than a decade of liaison expertise.

Our company creates the necessary bridge between your company and Bank / Legal Framework and all major sector. We work for your assigned project and help you get the Tender / Contract etc. We understand the legal and documentation requirements of the banks / financial institutions to the court. We have an edge over as we have been working for more than a decade delivering the desire results.

The management consist of hardcore professionals who have the necessary contacts in all sectors and institutions over the years. The team has helped in many in gaining contracts which was what they are (our clients) Thought was out of their reach. We are committed to our goals. India is riching out the world, you can reach out to us and we can do wonders.
name: RUDRA4CARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
AMOS L&C Insurance Brokers Pvt. Ltd. is registered with IRDA as a Direct Insurance Broker since November 2019. We specialize in providing diversified retail and corporate insurance solutions, across multiple industries. We also provide ‘CONSULTATIVE CLAIM SERVICES’ to ease out your financial problems at the time of losses or damages in unavoidable circumstances.


We’re simplifying insurance products so that even a 15-year-old can comprehend them. We believe this can be changed; the way insurance products are viewed, purchased, and claimed. Simply put, we are here ‘To Make Insurance Simple.’ With that as our mission, we are reimagining products, and redesigning processes. We are going back to the basics and building simple and transparent insurance solutions, that matter to people.


Meet the FOUNDER and CEO changing the insurance industry forever. We’ve got a great mix of industry veterans who know what’s working and new age technology specialists who know what needs to change. These are the people walking in your shoes so that you get the insurance you need and deserve.


Sanjay V More

Principal Officer


A management postgraduate and passionate about insurance, Sanjay brings an astute understanding of general insurance category. He has spent more than 14 years handling large insurance portfolios while working with General Insurance Cos. specifically for Shipping and Banking Sector. He had been responsible for implementing insurance solutions worth INR 100 crores for Axis Bank’s In-house portfolio.


M.P. Jairam

Principal Advisor


Ex. Deputy General Manager of United India Insurance Co. Ltd. A Chartered Accountant, Qualified Associate member of Insurance Institute of India, retired senior official with vast 35+ years of professional experience in General Insurance Industry. Mr. Jairam brings in-depth qualitative insurance solutions to the organization with detailed eye on compliance and regulatory changes.
name: AMOS L&C INSURANCE BROKERS PRIVATE LIMITED
